name: Pixel Slime Duck Helper
description:
A game for the "Cant draw but want to make a game (again)" game jam.

This game is about a slime that keeps running into ducks that want help. Warning, this game is really annoying at some point (or all the points), and you might not understand what the pixels mean, to truly understand the meaning of the game, there is none, have "fun" :D and good luck :).

Controls:
* WASD to move.
* Move into an NPC to talk to it, and when you see the "conversation" you click space to go to the next piece of "conversation".
* The top controls are the only controls, there are no mouse controls.
